fields.name: author
fields.label: Author
fields.description: Enter the author of the post

fields.name: hero_image
fields.label: Hero image
fields.description: This will appear in the header of the post.

fields.name: alt
fields.label: Alternate text
fields.description: Use this text to describe the image for humans and robots who can’t see images.

fields.name: caption
fields.label: Caption
fields.description: This text will appear under the image. It shouldn’t be the same as the alternate text.

fields.name: excerpt
fields.label: Excerpt
fields.description: This can appear as a preview summary of the post.

fields.name: external_link
fields.label: External link
fields.description: The URL to the external page this post is about, if applicable.

fields.name: draft
fields.label: Draft
fields.description: Turn this off to publish the post on the public site. Keep it on to preview the post.

fields.name: image_large
alt
fields.label: Alternate text
fields.description: Use this text to describe the image for humans and robots who can’t see images.

fields.name: caption
fields.label: Caption
fields.description: This text will appear under the image. It shouldn’t be the same as the alternate text. (This isn't being used.)

fields.label: Image
fields.description: An image to appear on the page.

fields.name: image_small
alt
fields.label: Alternate text
fields.description: Use this text to describe the image for humans and robots who can’t see images.

fields.name: caption
fields.label: Caption
fields.description: This text will appear under the image. It shouldn’t be the same as the alternate text. (This isn't being used.)

fields.label: Image (small)
fields.description: A small image to appear below posts.
